Command line: /usr/local/bin/spades.py	--meta	-1	/home/data/raw/ERR866589_1.fastq.gz	-2	/home/data/raw/ERR866589_2.fastq.gz	-o	/home/data/ERR8665/ERR866589/metaspades/001	-m	8000	

System information:
  SPAdes version: 3.12.0
  Python version: 3.6.5
  OS: Linux-4.9.93-linuxkit-aufs-x86_64-with-glibc2.2.5

Output dir: /home/data/ERR8665/ERR866589/metaspades/001
Mode: read error correction and assembling
Debug mode is turned OFF

Dataset parameters:
  Metagenomic mode
  Reads:
    Library number: 1, library type: paired-end
      orientation: fr
      left reads: ['/home/data/raw/ERR866589_1.fastq.gz']
      right reads: ['/home/data/raw/ERR866589_2.fastq.gz']
      interlaced reads: not specified
      single reads: not specified
      merged reads: not specified
Read error correction parameters:
  Iterations: 1
  PHRED offset will be auto-detected
  Corrected reads will be compressed
Assembly parameters:
  k: [21, 33, 55]
  Repeat resolution is enabled
  Mismatch careful mode is turned OFF
  MismatchCorrector will be SKIPPED
  Coverage cutoff is turned OFF
Other parameters:
  Dir for temp files: /home/data/ERR8665/ERR866589/metaspades/001/tmp
  Threads: 16
  Memory limit (in Gb): 8000
